subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: After all the rain, after all the fury, after all the distractions of this most hurly-burly of tennis tournaments, the 15th day of the U.S. Open had something to give.
snippet: After all the rain, after all the fury, after all the distractions of this most hurly-burly of tennis tournaments, the 15th day of the U.S. Open had something to give.
